00045     template<typename BASE, typename DST> static DST endian( const BASE *b ) {
00046         DST ret = 0;
00047 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00048 
00049         for ( short i = 0; i < ( short )sizeof( DST ); i++ )
00050 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00051         for ( short i = ( short )sizeof( DST ) - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00052 #else
00053 #error "Sorry your endianess is not supported. What the heck are you comiling on ??"
00054 #endif
00055             ret += b[i] << i * 8;
00056 
00057         return ret;
00058     }
00059     static size_t parseCSAEntry( Uint8 *at, isis::util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect );
